content:
As an AI language model, I don't have access to the latest news and updates regarding the Montreal Canadiens or their new acquisitions for the upcoming NHL season. However, based on general hockey trends, it's possible that teams facing the Canadiens might implement new strategies or tactics to counter their new players' strengths.

For example, if the Canadiens have acquired a strong offensive player, opposing teams might focus on shutting down their passing lanes or physical play to disrupt their scoring opportunities. Other teams might also try to exploit any weaknesses in the Canadiens' lineup or target specific players for their defensive game plan.

Overall, teams will likely adjust their tactics and strategies depending on the Canadiens' new acquisitions and how they perform on the ice. However, the Canadiens themselves will also adapt and adjust their playing style to maximize their strengths and minimize their weaknesses as a team.
